name: Notices
text: [§431:3-412]  Notices.  All notices by the commissioner to an insurer which may result in regulatory action hereunder shall be effective upon dispatch if transmitted by registered or certified mail or, in the case of any other transmission, shall be effective upon the insurer's receipt of the notice. [L 1994, c 190, pt of §1 am L 1995, c 61, §2 as superseded by c 232, §4; am L 1999, c 128, §2]
